name: P07_10s
prompt: suburban home front porch, viewed from an elevated vantage point near the front door, looking outward at night. Single porch light provides harsh overhead illumination with deep shadows. A person in dark hoodie with hood pulled up, face obscured by hood, average build, moving with cautious purposeful gait. They crouch down near the door, staying low and out of direct light. Static downward-angled viewpoint, wide-angle with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, IR-tinted footage quality with slight grain. Real-time speed, natural fluid human motion at 1x playback rate.
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, artifacts, glitches, distorted, unrealistic motion, multiple camera angles, jump cuts, visible camera, security camera device, doorbell camera, camera lens visible, camera equipment, camera housing, surveillance camera in frame, camera mount, camera on wall, camera on ceiling, camera rig, recording device in shot, gopro, webcam, CCTV camera visible, Ring doorbell visible, Nest camera visible, slow motion, time lapse, fast forward, sped up, slowed down
